Storeroom, Wardrobe, Furniture, Built-in furniture, Technique, Telephone, Internet, Satellite, Cable-TV, Alarm System, Elevator, Heating system: gas, Hot water: gas 
 Cozy apartment of 80 sq.m. 5 minutes from the center of Tbilisi and at the same time in a beautiful, clean and cool place because It is located above the town on the territory of the ethnographic park. Singing birds, beautiful views, great location, full staffing granted apartments, a parking area and a video registration - will be the basis of your comfort and safety.
